name: RK garage: Christmas drive pro
description:
- The first real life car racing game for real drivers.
- Christmas Ride mission.
- Drive more, collect rewards and buy new cars.
- Fill your garage with exotic fast cars.
- Compete with your friends.
- dominate the Game Center leaderboard.
- Be the legend of Asphalt.
- New modern dashboard.
- improved designes.
- Limited time holiday season challenges.
- Play the game and explore the world.
- enrich your ride experience with the mobile dashboard that shows the speed, distance and navigation data.
- Remember to drive safely and to obey the local driving laws.
- this game doesn't encourage fast driving, your safety is a priority.
